column1: #Text=Toph says : " Do n't make me put this down ! "
#Text=Ghashiun says : " Put a muzzle on him ! "
#Text=" Sandbender # 1 says : " What 's your father gon na do when he finds out we lost a sand - sailer ?
#Text=It 's the one we stole from the Hami Tribe .
#Text=We 'll still make a profit from selling him to those beetle - headed merchants .
#Text=" Merchant # 2 says : " I bet someone will pay a fortune for him in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Merchant # 1 says : " All right , you 've got a deal .
